amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Privacy and Civil Liberties Oversight Board by $750,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Privacy and Civil Liberties Board by $750,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Shays.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
